hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(test("^(production/|prod/|dist/|build/)"))' | grep -q . && echo '🚫 Error: Cannot modify production/build files. Please modify source files instead.' >&2 && exit 2 || exit 0

jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(test("\\.env$|credentials|secrets|private-key|secret"))' | grep -q . && echo '🔒 Error: Cannot modify sensitive files. Please update manually for security.' >&2 && exit 2 || exit 0

jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(test("node_modules/|vendor/|venv/|__pycache__/"))' | grep -q . && echo '⚠️  Error: Cannot modify dependency directories. Please update package manager files instead.' >&2 && exit 2 || exit 0
